title: Trump's comments 'unfortunate, unhelpful': Ryan
text:
Trump's comments 'unfortunate, unhelpful': Ryan 1:41pm EST - 01:23 
U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Friday that President Donald Trump's reported comments on African nations and Haiti at Thursday's bipartisan immigration meeting were 'unfortunate' and 'unhelpful'.   
U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Friday that President Donald Trump's reported comments on African nations and Haiti at Thursday's bipartisan immigration meeting were 'unfortunate' and 'unhelpful'.  //reut.rs/2D6Aplr
